verses.verse: וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <S%H559><s%> Then said יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> the LORD אֵלַ֔י <S%H413><s%> to me אִם־ <S%H518><s%> though יַעֲמֹ֨ד <S%H5975><s%> stood מֹשֶׁ֤ה <S%H4872><s%> unto me Though Moses וּשְׁמוּאֵל֙ <S%H8050><s%> and Samuel לְפָנַ֔י <S%H6440><s%> before אֵ֥ין <S%H369><s%> Me נַפְשִׁ֖י <S%H5315><s%> me [yet] my mind אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about הָעָ֣ם <S%H5971><s%> [could] not [be] toward this people הַזֶּ֑ה <S%H2088><s%> this שַׁלַּ֥ח <S%H7971><s%> cast [them] out מֵֽעַל־ <S%H5921><s%> from פָּנַ֖י <S%H6440><s%> of my sight וְיֵצֵֽאוּ׃ <S%H3318><s%> and let them go forth

וְהָיָ֛ה <S%H1961><s%> shall be that כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> when יֹאמְר֥וּ <S%H559><s%> And it shall come to pass if they say אֵלֶ֖יךָ <S%H413><s%> to you אָ֣נָה <S%H575><s%> Where נֵצֵ֑א <S%H3318><s%> unto thee Whither shall we go forth וְאָמַרְתָּ֨ <S%H559><s%> ? then thou shalt tell אֲלֵיהֶ֜ם <S%H413><s%> to כֹּֽה־ <S%H3541><s%> Thus אָמַ֣ר <S%H559><s%> them Thus saith יְהוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> those לַמָּ֤וֶת <S%H4194><s%> Such as [are] for death לַמָּ֙וֶת֙ <S%H4194><s%> to death וַאֲשֶׁ֤ר <S%H834><s%> and those לַחֶ֙רֶב֙ <S%H2719><s%> and such as [are] for the sword לַחֶ֔רֶב <S%H2719><s%> to the sword וַאֲשֶׁ֤ר <S%H834><s%> and those לָֽרָעָב֙ <S%H7458><s%> and such as [are] for the famine לָֽרָעָ֔ב <S%H7458><s%> to the famine וַאֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> and those לַשְּׁבִ֖י <S%H7628><s%> and such as [are] for the captivity לַשֶּֽׁבִי׃ <S%H7628><s%> to the captivity

וּפָקַדְתִּ֨י <S%H6485><s%> And I will appoint עֲלֵיהֶ֜ם <S%H5921><s%> over אַרְבַּ֤ע <S%H702><s%> over them four מִשְׁפָּחוֹת֙ <S%H4940><s%> kinds נְאֻם־ <S%H5002><s%> saith יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַחֶ֣רֶב <S%H2719><s%> the sword לַֽהֲרֹ֔ג <S%H2026><s%> to slay וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַכְּלָבִ֖ים <S%H3611><s%> and the dogs לִסְחֹ֑ב <S%H5498><s%> to tear וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ע֧וֹף <S%H5775><s%> and the fowls הַשָּׁמַ֛יִם <S%H8064><s%> of the heaven וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בֶּהֱמַ֥ת <S%H929><s%> and the beasts הָאָ֖רֶץ <S%H776><s%> of the earth לֶאֱכֹ֥ל <S%H398><s%> to devour וּלְהַשְׁחִֽית׃ <S%H7843><s%> and destroy

וּנְתַתִּ֣ים <S%H5414><s%> And I will cause [לִזְוָעָה כ] (לְזַֽעֲוָ֔ה <S%H2113><s%> be removed ק) לְכֹ֖ל <S%H3605><s%> all מַמְלְכ֣וֹת <S%H4467><s%> into all kingdoms הָאָ֑רֶץ <S%H776><s%> of the earth בִּ֠גְלַל <S%H1558><s%> because מְנַשֶּׁ֤ה <S%H4519><s%> of Manasseh בֶן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son יְחִזְקִיָּ֙הוּ֙ <S%H2396><s%> of Hezekiah מֶ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> king יְהוּדָ֔ה <S%H3063><s%> of Judah עַ֥ל <S%H5921><s%> for אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> what עָשָׂ֖ה <S%H6213><s%> for [that] which he did בִּירוּשָׁלִָֽם׃ <S%H3389><s%> in Jerusalem

כִּ֠י <S%H3588><s%> Indeed מִֽי־ <S%H4310><s%> who יַחְמֹ֤ל <S%H2550><s%> For who shall have pity עָלַ֙יִךְ֙ <S%H5921><s%> on יְר֣וּשָׁלִַ֔ם <S%H3389><s%> Jerusalem וּמִ֖י <S%H4310><s%> who יָנ֣וּד <S%H5110><s%> will mourn לָ֑ךְ וּמִ֣י <S%H4310><s%> who יָס֔וּר <S%H5493><s%> thee? or who shall go aside לִשְׁאֹ֥ל <S%H7592><s%> to ask לְשָׁלֹ֖ם <S%H7965><s%> favor לָֽךְ׃

אַ֣תְּ <S%H859><s%> who נָטַ֥שְׁתְּ <S%H5203><s%> Thou hast forsaken אֹתִ֛י <S%H853><s%> נְאֻם־ <S%H5002><s%> me saith יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD אָח֣וֹר <S%H268><s%> backward תֵּלֵ֑כִי <S%H1980><s%> going וָאַ֨ט <S%H5186><s%> therefore will I stretch out אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יָדִ֤י <S%H3027><s%> my hand עָלַ֙יִךְ֙ <S%H5921><s%> against וָֽאַשְׁחִיתֵ֔ךְ <S%H7843><s%> against thee and destroy נִלְאֵ֖יתִי <S%H3811><s%> thee I am weary הִנָּחֵֽם׃ <S%H5162><s%> with repenting

וָאֶזְרֵ֥ם <S%H2219><s%> And I will fan בְּמִזְרֶ֖ה <S%H4214><s%> them with a fan בְּשַׁעֲרֵ֣י <S%H8179><s%> in the gates הָאָ֑רֶץ <S%H776><s%> of the land שִׁכַּ֤לְתִּי <S%H7921><s%> I will bereave אִבַּ֙דְתִּי֙ <S%H6><s%> [them] of children I will destroy אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> עַמִּ֔י <S%H5971><s%> my people מִדַּרְכֵיהֶ֖ם <S%H1870><s%> not from their ways לוֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> did not שָֽׁבוּ׃ <S%H7725><s%> [since] they return

עָֽצְמוּ־ <S%H6105><s%> are increased לִ֤י אַלְמְנֹתָו֙ <S%H490><s%> Their widows מֵח֣וֹל <S%H2344><s%> to me above the sand יַמִּ֔ים <S%H3220><s%> of the seas הֵבֵ֨אתִי <S%H935><s%> I have brought לָהֶ֥ם <S%H1992><s%> them עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> against אֵ֛ם <S%H517><s%> upon them against the mother בָּח֖וּר <S%H970><s%> of the young men שֹׁדֵ֣ד <S%H7703><s%> a spoiler בַּֽצָּהֳרָ֑יִם <S%H6672><s%> at noonday הִפַּ֤לְתִּי <S%H5307><s%> I have caused [him] to fall עָלֶ֙יהָ֙ <S%H5921><s%> against פִּתְאֹ֔ם <S%H6597><s%> upon it suddenly עִ֖יר <S%H5892><s%> upon the city וּבֶהָלֽוֹת׃ <S%H928><s%> and terrors

אֻמְלְלָ֞ה <S%H535><s%> languisheth יֹלֶ֣דֶת <S%H3205><s%> She that hath borne הַשִּׁבְעָ֗ה <S%H7651><s%> seven נָפְחָ֥ה <S%H5301><s%> she hath given up נַפְשָׁ֛הּ <S%H5315><s%> the ghost [בָּאָה כ] (בָּ֥א <S%H935><s%> abide ק) שִׁמְשָׁ֛הּ <S%H8121><s%> her sun בְּעֹ֥ד <S%H5750><s%> yet יוֹמָ֖ם <S%H3119><s%> day בּ֣וֹשָׁה <S%H954><s%> she hath been ashamed וְחָפֵ֑רָה <S%H2659><s%> and confounded וּשְׁאֵֽרִיתָ֗ם <S%H7611><s%> and the residue לַחֶ֧רֶב <S%H2719><s%> to the sword אֶתֵּ֛ן <S%H5414><s%> of them will I deliver לִפְנֵ֥י <S%H6440><s%> before אֹיְבֵיהֶ֖ם <S%H341><s%> their enemies נְאֻם־ <S%H5002><s%> saith יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> the LORD ס

אֽוֹי־ <S%H188><s%> Woe לִ֣י אִמִּ֔י <S%H517><s%> is me my mother כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> that יְלִדְתִּ֗נִי <S%H3205><s%> that thou hast borne אִ֥ישׁ <S%H376><s%> me a man רִ֛יב <S%H7379><s%> of strife וְאִ֥ישׁ <S%H376><s%> and a man מָד֖וֹן <S%H4066><s%> of contention לְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> to all הָאָ֑רֶץ <S%H776><s%> to the whole earth לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> nor נָשִׁ֥יתִי <S%H5383><s%> I have neither lent on usury וְלֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> nor נָֽשׁוּ־ <S%H5383><s%> nor men have lent to me on usury בִ֖י כֻּלֹּ֥ה <S%H3605><s%> to me everyone מְקַלְלַֽונִי׃ <S%H7043><s%> [yet] every one of them doth curse ס

אָמַ֣ר <S%H559><s%> said יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> The LORD אִם־ <S%H518><s%> verily לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> not [שָׁרֹותִךָ כ] (שֵֽׁרִיתִ֖יךָ <S%H8325><s%> Sharar ק) לְט֑וֹב <S%H2896><s%> it shall be well אִם־ <S%H518><s%> lo ל֣וֹא ׀ <S%H3808><s%> not הִפְגַּ֣עְתִּֽי <S%H6293><s%> to entreat בְךָ֗ בְּעֵ֥ת־ <S%H6256><s%> thee [well] in the time רָעָ֛ה <S%H7451><s%> of evil וּבְעֵ֥ת <S%H6256><s%> and in the time צָרָ֖ה <S%H6869><s%> of affliction אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָאֹיֵֽב׃ <S%H341><s%> I will cause the enemy
הֲיָרֹ֨עַ <S%H7489><s%> break בַּרְזֶ֧ל ׀ <S%H1270><s%> Shall iron בַּרְזֶ֛ל <S%H1270><s%> iron מִצָּפ֖וֹן <S%H6828><s%> the northern וּנְחֹֽשֶׁת׃ <S%H5178><s%> brasen

חֵילְךָ֧ <S%H2428><s%> Thy substance וְאוֹצְרוֹתֶ֛יךָ <S%H214><s%> and thy treasures לָבַ֥ז <S%H957><s%> to the spoil אֶתֵּ֖ן <S%H5414><s%> will I give לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> without בִמְחִ֑יר <S%H4242><s%> without price וּבְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> for all חַטֹּאותֶ֖יךָ <S%H2403><s%> and [that] for all thy sins וּבְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all גְּבוּלֶֽיךָ׃ <S%H1366><s%> even in all thy borders

וְהַֽעֲבַרְתִּי֙ <S%H5674><s%> And I will make [thee] to pass אֶת־ <S%H854><s%> for אֹ֣יְבֶ֔יךָ <S%H341><s%> with thine enemies בְּאֶ֖רֶץ <S%H776><s%> into a land לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> not יָדָ֑עְתָּ <S%H3045><s%> [which] thou knowest כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> For אֵ֛שׁ <S%H784><s%> not for a fire קָדְחָ֥ה <S%H6919><s%> is kindled בְאַפִּ֖י <S%H639><s%> in mine anger עֲלֵיכֶ֥ם <S%H5921><s%> and תּוּקָֽד׃ <S%H3344><s%> [which] shall burn ס

אַתָּ֧ה <S%H859><s%> who יָדַ֣עְתָּ <S%H3045><s%> thou knowest יְהוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> O LORD זָכְרֵ֤נִי <S%H2142><s%> remember וּפָקְדֵ֙נִי֙ <S%H6485><s%> me and visit וְהִנָּ֤קֶם <S%H5358><s%> me and revenge לִי֙ מֵרֹ֣דְפַ֔י <S%H7291><s%> me of my persecutors אַל־ <S%H408><s%> not לְאֶ֥רֶךְ <S%H750><s%> of your patience אַפְּךָ֖ <S%H639><s%> anger תִּקָּחֵ֑נִי <S%H3947><s%> take me not away דַּ֕ע <S%H3045><s%> know שְׂאֵתִ֥י <S%H5375><s%> that for thy sake I have suffered עָלֶ֖יךָ <S%H5921><s%> your sake חֶרְפָּֽה׃ <S%H2781><s%> rebuke

נִמְצְא֤וּ <S%H4672><s%> were found דְבָרֶ֙יךָ֙ <S%H1697><s%> Thy words וָאֹ֣כְלֵ֔ם <S%H398><s%> and I did eat וַיְהִ֤י <S%H1961><s%> became [דְבָרֶיךָ כ] (דְבָֽרְךָ֙ <S%H1697><s%> your words ק) לִ֔י לְשָׂשׂ֖וֹן <S%H8342><s%> was unto me the joy וּלְשִׂמְחַ֣ת <S%H8057><s%> and rejoicing לְבָבִ֑י <S%H3824><s%> of mine heart כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for נִקְרָ֤א <S%H7121><s%> for I am called שִׁמְךָ֙ <S%H8034><s%> by thy name עָלַ֔י <S%H5921><s%> and יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> O LORD אֱלֹהֵ֥י <S%H430><s%> God צְבָאֽוֹת׃ <S%H6635><s%> of hosts ס

לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> Nor יָשַׁ֥בְתִּי <S%H3427><s%> I sat בְסוֹד־ <S%H5475><s%> not in the assembly מְשַׂחֲקִ֖ים <S%H7832><s%> of the mockers וָֽאֶעְלֹ֑ז <S%H5937><s%> nor rejoiced מִפְּנֵ֤י <S%H6440><s%> because יָֽדְךָ֙ <S%H3027><s%> of thy hand בָּדָ֣ד <S%H910><s%> alone יָשַׁ֔בְתִּי <S%H3427><s%> I sat כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> with זַ֖עַם <S%H2195><s%> me with indignation מִלֵּאתָֽנִי׃ <S%H4390><s%> for thou hast filled ס

לָ֣מָּה <S%H4100><s%> Why הָיָ֤ה <S%H1961><s%> been כְאֵבִי֙ <S%H3511><s%> Why is my pain נֶ֔צַח <S%H5331><s%> perpetual וּמַכָּתִ֖י <S%H4347><s%> and my wound אֲנוּשָׁ֑ה֙ <S%H605><s%> incurable מֵֽאֲנָה֙ <S%H3985><s%> [which] refuseth הֵֽרָפֵ֔א <S%H7495><s%> to be healed הָי֨וֹ <S%H1961><s%> been תִֽהְיֶ֥ה <S%H1961><s%> been לִי֙ כְּמ֣וֹ <S%H3644><s%> like אַכְזָ֔ב <S%H391><s%> ? wilt thou be altogether unto me as a liar מַ֖יִם <S%H4325><s%> [and as] waters לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> not נֶאֱמָֽנוּ׃ <S%H539><s%> [that] fail ס

לָכֵ֞ן <S%H3651><s%> Therefore כֹּֽה־ <S%H3541><s%> thus אָמַ֣ר <S%H559><s%> Therefore thus saith יְהוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD אִם־ <S%H518><s%> If תָּשׁ֤וּב <S%H7725><s%> If thou return וַאֲשִֽׁיבְךָ֙ <S%H7725><s%> then will I bring thee again לְפָנַ֣י <S%H6440><s%> before תַּֽעֲמֹ֔ד <S%H5975><s%> [and] thou shalt stand וְאִם־ <S%H518><s%> and if תּוֹצִ֥יא <S%H3318><s%> me and if thou take forth יָקָ֛ר <S%H3368><s%> the precious מִזּוֹלֵ֖ל <S%H2151><s%> from the vile כְּפִ֣י <S%H6310><s%> thou shalt be as my mouth תִֽהְיֶ֑ה <S%H1961><s%> will become יָשֻׁ֤בוּ <S%H7725><s%> let them return הֵ֙מָּה֙ <S%H1992><s%> their part אֵלֶ֔יךָ <S%H413><s%> about וְאַתָּ֖ה <S%H859><s%> you לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> not תָשׁ֥וּב <S%H7725><s%> unto thee but return אֲלֵיהֶֽם׃ <S%H413><s%> then

וּנְתַתִּ֜יךָ <S%H5414><s%> And I will make לָעָ֣ם <S%H5971><s%> thee unto this people הַזֶּ֗ה <S%H2088><s%> to this לְחוֹמַ֤ת <S%H2346><s%> wall נְחֹ֙שֶׁת֙ <S%H5178><s%> brasen בְּצוּרָ֔ה <S%H1219><s%> a fenced וְנִלְחֲמ֥וּ <S%H3898><s%> and they shall fight אֵלֶ֖יךָ <S%H413><s%> against וְלֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> They will not י֣וּכְלוּ <S%H3201><s%> against thee but they shall not prevail לָ֑ךְ כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for אִתְּךָ֥ <S%H854><s%> for אֲנִ֛י <S%H589><s%> I am לְהוֹשִֽׁיעֲךָ֥ <S%H3467><s%> against thee for I [am] with thee to save וּלְהַצִּילֶ֖ךָ <S%H5337><s%> thee and to deliver נְאֻם־ <S%H5002><s%> thee saith יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> the LORD

וְהִצַּלְתִּ֖יךָ <S%H5337><s%> And I will deliver מִיַּ֣ד <S%H3027><s%> thee out of the hand רָעִ֑ים <S%H7451><s%> of the wicked וּפְדִתִ֖יךָ <S%H6299><s%> and I will redeem מִכַּ֥ף <S%H3709><s%> thee out of the hand עָרִצִֽים׃ <S%H6184><s%> of the terrible פ
